Posts.Content: jpb wrote: I had a left mastectomy 4 weeks ago. I still seem to have a lot of fluid under my skin along the incision. Did others experience this and if so how long did it last? Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2010 03:45PM jpb wrote: Carcharm I had 9 lymph nodes removed and tested positive in 8. Not the best news but off to chemo and radiation I go! I also am overweight and do not have a sweet tooth.Its all about the salty snacks for me. I will TRY to cut down.
